pr_title: CSW / Configuration of the capabilities is now done using a service metadata record

CSW / Configuration of the capabilities is now done using a service metadata record.

timeline.bodyText:
Could not be better to use the metadata uuid? Should be more stable than internal ids.
Suppose that the user uses the import option to update the metadata, this option afaik removes the old record and creates a new one with a new id.
timeline.author: josegar74
